text: CLOSE On Friday, comedian and talk show host Rosie O ‘ Donnell said she was saddened by the news that her ex - wife had died of an apparent suicide. TMZ. com reported, O ‘ Donnell ’ s former wife Michelle Rounds was found dead at her home earlier this week. USA TODAY Rosie O'Donnell and her wife, Michelle Rounds, pose on Oct. 30, 2014 in New York. ( Photo : Bruce Glikas, FilmMagic ) Michelle Rounds, the ex - wife of Rosie O'Donnell who battled her for custody of their young daughter, died Monday at her Florida home of an apparent suicide. She was 46. ` ` I am saddened to hear about this terrible tragedy,'' O'Donnell said in a statement emailed to USA TO
